CustomField.description: Click here to enforce G2 bypass in case of Multi BG exception: MN+GS, MN+MW, MN+Cloudband, MN+NetAct, Care+Managed Services, Contract renewal or Nth phase of running contract
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Click here to enforce G2 bypass in case of Multi BG exception: MN+GS, MN+MW, MN+Cloudband, MN+NetAct, Care+Managed Services, Contract renewal or Nth phase of running contract
CustomField.label: Multi BG Exception/ Allow G2 Bypass
